strategicGoals.title: Excellent Learning Experience
strategicGoals.description: Ensure every student experiences an excellent, equitable education through the 5 Dimensions of Teaching and Learning Framework.

strategicGoals.title: Equitable Systems
strategicGoals.description: Build and sustain equitable systems that support the success of every student, particularly those historically underserved.

strategicGoals.title: Relevant and Engaging Learning
strategicGoals.description: Provide culturally relevant, real-world learning experiences that build trust, inclusivity, and engagement.

strategicGoals.title: Healthy Communities
strategicGoals.description: Foster healthy school communities through social-emotional learning, environmental stewardship, and strong partnerships.
